Demo for click DOM event in mo MathML element

Click in "+":

1 + 1
x + x
x + y

Click in −:

1 − 1
0 − 1
x − x
x − y

Click in "-":

1 - 1
0 - 1
x - x
x - y

Click in multiplication sign:

1 × 1
1 × 2
1 × 0
x × x
x × y

Click in middle dot:

1 · 1
1 · 2
1 · 0
x · x
x · y

Click in division sign:

1 ÷ 1
1 ÷ 2
1 ÷ 0
x ÷ x
x ÷ y

Click in ∕

1 ∕ 1
1 ∕ 2
1 ∕ 0
x ∕ x
x ∕ y

Click in "/":

1 / 1
1 / 2
1 / 0
x / x
x / y
This document was write by Raniere Silva.
MathML.js is developed and maintainer by Raniere Silva.
